text: A Visit to the Nursery is an oil painting by Jean-Honoré Fragonard. It was painted in 1775. It measures . It hangs in the National Gallery of Art in Washington, DC. Fragonard is usually remembered for his mildly erotic works. After his marriage in 1769, he painted family life. == References == * Category:1770s paintings Category:Paintings by Jean-Honoré Fragonard Category:Paintings in the National Gallery of Art, Washington DC
title: A Visit to the Nursery
